d220d7c3cc74490c7f2923f2ea85d00133afe98c.commitMessage:
Issue #2080: Fix typos in code

Fixes some `SpellCheckingInspection` inspection violations.

Description:
>Spellchecker inspection helps locate typos and misspelling in your code, comments and literals.

faa8a0b7a427385fab564d2959244355f8d9813f.commitMessage: Issue #46. Statements shouldn't be nested too deep

ef834b210cc5c7803ef930fcff96219b6b91922d.commitMessage:
Issue #1555: Narrow scope of variable

Fixes `TooBroadScope` inspection violations introduced in recent commit.

Description:
>Reports any variable declarations of which the scope can be narrowed. Especially useful for "Pascal style" declarations at the start of a method, but variables with too broad a scope are also often left over after refactorings.

d972822d63ee8eb60207e6de53632335dfbc4d52.commitMessage:
Remove unused assignment. #1555

Fixes `UnusedAssignment` inspection violations.

Description:
>This inspection points out the cases where a variable value is never used after its assignment.

35d1673788bbbac8263fdb69275dc6a63b095a24.commitMessage: Making local variables final where possible.

cbe38280adb03f058f89e8ea81bc0e3be2fc5b94.commitMessage:
Fixed 1249707: AbstractTypeAwareCheck doesn't work with types from typeparm

Some pretty big refactoring for typeaware checks performed.
Also added handling for type params.  Current handling algorithm
has some preconditions and restriction, but it works for most cases
(not sure I've covered all situation when type param will have name
of real exception, but I do not think it is critical for now :)

Also, I've added column number for JavadocTag (mainly to be able use
ClassInfo for it).  So, JavadocTypeCheck also affected.

And I've added new logger for TreeWalker (if we have loggers we should
use them :)

db19bd67dcea375b1b94d76b7267ccbc1a5ecc0b.commitMessage: Checnge some check to use new API (I hate wrapping :)

72be23f288369fdd9e562999bb9b0e2ff646c897.commitMessage: Fix for 855839 - JavadocMethod does not correctly treat {@inheritDoc}.

Moving another Javadoc check to see what is involved.

support having the smarts to do the CVS operations.
